description: Tools for optimizing staff scheduling and allocation

tools.name: get_weekend_traffic_forecast
tools.description: Retrieves predicted customer traffic levels for stores during the upcoming weekend

weekend_date.description: The weekend date in YYYY-MM-DD format (Saturday date)

store_ids.description: Optional list of specific store IDs to check. If not provided, returns all stores

tools.name: get_current_staff_schedules
tools.description: Gets the current staff scheduling information for specified stores and time period

store_ids.description: Optional list of store IDs. If not provided, returns all stores

tools.name: calculate_staffing_requirements
tools.description: Calculates optimal staffing levels based on expected traffic, store size, and operational requirements

store_id.description: The store ID to calculate requirements for

special_events.description: Optional list of special events or promotions that may affect staffing needs

tools.name: get_available_staff_pool
tools.description: Retrieves list of available staff members who can work additional shifts during specified time period

store_ids.description: Optional list of store IDs to check for available staff. If not provided, checks all stores

minimum_hours_available.description: Minimum number of hours the staff member should be available
